channel.title: Psx roms
channel.description:
hey im new here. whatsup :D. but on to the real reason i made this thread.
where can i find roms for epsxe program. more importantley where can i find the mgs vr missions game for this. i have looked every where and i was pointed in this direction. i do have a zip file that says its mgs vr missions but it has 2 files in it that are a bin and a cue file. im just wondering if this is the game or not. and if it is the game how do i make it so i can use it on the program. thanks for the help J_scap

item.title: Psx roms
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:7, topic:215965”][quote author=Mupescape link=topic=283820.msg2334314#msg2334314 date=1216019078]

PSX is what the clueless call the PlayStation 1.

They’re referred to as iso’s, not roms, with this knowledge you can now hit google.

Sorry if this is a pretty late post just checked this out as of today, Yeah it would be considered ROM’s when you would be using emanulators, but other just like Socom (Ripped) would be considerd ISO’s. I would know this because I have too much time on my hands when it comes to PSP’s lol and also there is a folder in the emanulator’s folder called “ROMS” soz, and if you do have a ‘hacked’ psp in the root of you’re memory stick there is a folder called “ISO”.
[/quote]

Except he wasn’t talking about the PSP.[/quote]
oh, lol…wow

Read full topic

They’re referred to as iso’s, not roms, with this knowledge you can now hit google.

Sorry if this is a pretty late post just checked this out as of today, Yeah it would be considered ROM’s when you would be using emanulators, but other just like Socom (Ripped) would be considerd ISO’s. I would know this because I have too much time on my hands when it comes to PSP’s lol and also there is a folder in the emanulator’s folder called “ROMS” soz, and if you do have a ‘hacked’ psp in the root of you’re memory stick there is a folder called “ISO”.[/quote]

item.title: Psx roms
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:4, topic:215965”]PSX is what the clueless call the PlayStation 1.

They’re referred to as iso’s, not roms, with this knowledge you can now hit google.[/quote]
Sorry if this is a pretty late post just checked this out as of today, Yeah it would be considered ROM’s when you would be using emanulators, but other just like Socom (Ripped) would be considerd ISO’s. I would know this because I have too much time on my hands when it comes to PSP’s lol and also there is a folder in the emanulator’s folder called “ROMS” soz, and if you do have a ‘hacked’ psp in the root of you’re memory stick there is a folder called “ISO”.

item.dc:creator: @J_scap J_scap
item.description:
@J_scap wrote:

ok thanks i think i found it i will say if it works or not in 20 minutes[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2008, 03:31:59 PM[/size][hr]ok its going super fast and i cant contoll anything can you please help me on this[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 29, 2008, 06:36:24 PM[/size][hr]the game its self is going uncontrollably fast can someone please help me with this. i have tried to find another emulator but nothing is working on my cpu

item.description:

PSX is the program to play original PlayStation ROMs, am I correct? You just have to go to ROM sites, and look through the category box for PlayStation ROMs, or ePSX specific ROMs.
